history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER n g
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to anthony n. g. wakim, md. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Transit
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER nothing
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where would you like to leave from?
USER Justin Craig
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where are you leaving from?
USER Fifth and Craig
TTS Okay, leaving from fifth avenue and north craig st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:08 am.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 12 minutes, and you will take 1 bus..
Walk for about 2 mins to Fifth avenue at Neville St..
Take the 71D ,to Fifth avenue at Chesterfield Rd. It will depart at 10:19am..
Walk for about 5 mins to 300 Halket St, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
